1.context:
The data are from BevCo Industries Inc., a multinational drink and beverage company. Make sure you take into account the file paths when understanding the data, for example:
- MKT is about marketing
- B2B is about business to business sales
- DTC is about direct to consumer action
Extract the information only in English.

1.name: Occasions - SOFT DRINK
1.description: How often a specific soft drink brand is selected or consumed within a week over a four-week period, over different quarters from 2023 to 2024. It's a metric used to track brand popularity or consumption habits. P7D/P4W means 'Per 7 Days / Per 4 Weeks,' indicating the timeframe over which these occasions are measured.

columns.name: Label
columns.description: Soft drink brand or label being analyzed.

columns.name: Occasions P7D/P4W 2023 Q2
columns.description: Number of occasions in the past 7 days over 4 weeks for 2023 Q2.

columns.name: Occasions P7D/P4W 2023 Q3
columns.description: Number of occasions in the past 7 days over 4 weeks for 2023 Q3.

columns.name: Occasions P7D/P4W 2023 Q4
columns.description: Number of occasions in the past 7 days over 4 weeks for 2023 Q4.

columns.name: Occasions P7D/P4W 2024 Q1
columns.description: Number of occasions in the past 7 days over 4 weeks for 2024 Q1.

columns.name: Occasions P7D/P4W 2024 Q2
columns.description: Number of occasions in the past 7 days over 4 weeks for 2024 Q2.

columns.name: Occasions P7D/P4W 2024 Q3
columns.description: Number of occasions in the past 7 days over 4 weeks for 2024 Q3.

columns.name: Occasions P7D/P4W 2024 Q4
columns.description: Number of occasions in the past 7 days over 4 weeks for 2024 Q4.

2.name: weather
2.description: Tracks weather data for various cities. It is a record of daily weather observations including temperature, precipitation, and humidity. The data is used for analyzing weather patterns and their impact on business operations, particularly in the context of B2B sales for BevCo Industries.

columns.name: order_date
columns.description: The date of the weather observation or order.

columns.name: uf
columns.description: The state abbreviation where the city is located.

columns.name: city
columns.description: The name of the city where the weather data was recorded.

columns.name: latitude
columns.description: The latitude coordinate of the city.

columns.name: longitude
columns.description: The longitude coordinate of the city.

columns.name: precipitation
columns.description: The amount of precipitation recorded on the order date, in millimeters.

columns.name: L15D_avg_precipitation
columns.description: The average precipitation over the last 15 days, in millimeters.

columns.name: L365D_avg_precipitation
columns.description: The average precipitation over the last 365 days, in millimeters.

columns.name: avg_relativeHumidity
columns.description: The average relative humidity percentage on the order date.

columns.name: min_temperature
columns.description: The minimum temperature recorded on the order date, in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: max_temperature
columns.description: The maximum temperature recorded on the order date, in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: avg_temperature
columns.description: The average temperature on the order date, in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: L15D_avg_temperature
columns.description: The average temperature over the last 15 days, in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: L365D_avg_temperature
columns.description: The average temperature over the last 365 days, in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: min_temperatureFeelsLike
columns.description: The minimum 'feels like' temperature on the order date, in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: max_temperatureFeelsLike
columns.description: The maximum 'feels like' temperature on the order date, in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: avg_temperatureFeelsLike
columns.description: The average 'feels like' temperature on the order date, in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: L15D_avg_temperatureFeelsLike
columns.description: The average 'feels like' temperature over the last 15 days, in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: L365D_avg_temperatureFeelsLike
columns.description: The average 'feels like' temperature over the last 365 days, in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: data_capture
columns.description: The date when the data was last updated.

3.name: participation
3.description: This sheet contains participation data for various soft drink brands over different quarters from 2023 to 2024. The data represents the participation percentage of legal drinking age (LDA+) individuals in the last 4 weeks (P4W) for each brand.

columns.name: Brand
columns.description: Name of the soft drink brand.

columns.name: 2023 Q2 Participation
columns.description: Participation percentage of LDA+ individuals in the last 4 weeks for 2023 Q2.

columns.name: 2023 Q3 Participation
columns.description: Participation percentage of LDA+ individuals in the last 4 weeks for 2023 Q3.

columns.name: 2023 Q4 Participation
columns.description: Participation percentage of LDA+ individuals in the last 4 weeks for 2023 Q4.

columns.name: 2024 Q1 Participation
columns.description: Participation percentage of LDA+ individuals in the last 4 weeks for 2024 Q1.

columns.name: 2024 Q2 Participation
columns.description: Participation percentage of LDA+ individuals in the last 4 weeks for 2024 Q2.

columns.name: 2024 Q3 Participation
columns.description: Participation percentage of LDA+ individuals in the last 4 weeks for 2024 Q3.

columns.name: 2024 Q4 Participation
columns.description: Participation percentage of LDA+ individuals in the last 4 weeks for 2024 Q4.

4.name: servings
4.description: This sheet contains servings data for various soft drink brands over different quarters from 2023 to 2024. The data is used for marketing insights by BevCo Industries to track the performance of their soft drink brands.

5.name: Brand Power
5.description: This sheet contains brand performance data for various soft drink brands for the years 2023 and 2024. It includes metrics such as premium, power, meaningfulness, difference, salience, and power calibration, along with their comparisons to last year (LY) and last period (LP).

columns.description: Name of the country where the data is collected.

columns.name: Brand Name
columns.description: Name of the soft drink brand.

columns.name: Premium
columns.description: Premium value for the brand in 2023 Q4.

columns.name: Premium vs LY
columns.description: Comparison of the premium value against last year for 2023 Q4.

columns.name: Premium vs LP
columns.description: Comparison of the premium value against last period for 2023 Q4.

columns.name: Power
columns.description: Power value for the brand in 2023 Q4.

columns.name: Power vs LY

9.name: Cupons
9.description: This sheet contains data related to coupons issued by BevCo Industries for direct-to-consumer actions. It includes details about the coupon code, creation date, validity period, usage limits, coupon value, last usage, and the number of orders associated with each coupon.

columns.name: CouponCode
columns.description: Unique identifier for the coupon

columns.name: CreationDate
columns.description: Date and time when the coupon was created

columns.name: ValidityStart
columns.description: Start date and time of the coupon validity period

columns.name: ValidityEnd
columns.description: End date and time of the coupon validity period

columns.name: UsageLimit
columns.description: Maximum number of times the coupon can be used

columns.name: CouponValue
columns.description: Value of the coupon

columns.name: LastUse
columns.description: Date and time of the last usage of the coupon

columns.name: OrderCount
columns.description: Number of orders associated with the coupon
